overview: A desperate and poor couple, Kamil (Fizz Fairuz) & Soraya (Nabila Huda), motivated by greed and lust for material and spiritual wealth, is forced to make a pact with the devil which involves certain forbidden rituals. But when Soraya is caught by the police and implicated in a murder, Kamil must build a strong case against the prosecutors and race against time to save her from certain death.
tagline: Perjanjian Durjana. Pertaruhan Nyawa. [Doom Agreement. Betting Lives.]
title: Bisikan Syaitan
